Reviews.Content: Great break Thoroughly enjoyable holiday break at Mango. Superior room was clean, well equipped and serviced daily by friendly staff. Staff were exceptional, made us very welcome and nothing was too much trouble. Very attractive compact pool was well maintained and a welcome respite after a days sightseeing. Great value +++
Reviews.Author: Suksamar

Reviews.Content: Beautiful Puri Mango       out side Puri Mango
